tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_results (
    audit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ar_content_id UUID NOT NULL,
    audit_date DATE NOT NULL,
    auditor_id UUID NOT NULL,
    bias_detected BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE audits_of_ar_content (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ar_content_id INT,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
    detected_biases VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE audits (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 audit_date DATE,
 auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
 ar_content_id INT,
 audit_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE auditors (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(50),
 expertise_area VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ar_content (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 content_name VARCHAR(100),
 creator_name VARCHAR(50),
 creation_date DATE,
 ar_platform VARCHAR(50)
)
